description: Piloting a Pro-Poor Public Private Partnership in Water Service Delivery for the Urban Poor

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: 1. Improved policies and programs on water supply and sanitation service delivery experienced at the local level; 2. Enabling environment facilitated for engaging SSWPs to augment water service delivery requirements in poor urban communities; 3. increased capacities of SSWPs to deliver water services to urban poor communities;
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Water Service Delivery

title: Public Private Partne Water Serv Delivery for Urban Poor
